title: Valeo says new power electronics product manufacturing facility in Pune to augment capacity
description: Valeo has launched a new power electronics manufacturing facility in Pune, increasing its capacity for producing rooftop panels from 900 kW to 1,600 kW. This move aims to meet the growing demand for electrification products in India. The company also emphasizes workforce diversity and sustainability, employing over 40 individuals with disabilities.
